name: A small journey (TheOreo)
description:
a really really small game created for a jam by me, mainly to learn how to code a game.

windows paint is my best friend.

also, the walls kill you, this is unintended, so try to not touch them.

might also have content not suitable for everyone

A and D: move left and right 

W: jump 

mouse: aim for shooting.

spacebar: shoot
